name: Space Lab Escape
description:
A VR escape room experience about a robot at risk of becoming spare parts.

You've been switched on in an unfamiliar space station lab, it seems like a place where robots like yourself and creatures come to be used as spare parts. But you're not ready to be deactivated and broken apart just yet. Find a way to escape from this station without being detected.

- Made in Unity w/ XR interaction Toolkit
- Tested on Oculus Quest 1
